description: Gets the properties of the specified container group in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation returns the properties of each container group including containers, image registry credentials, restart policy, IP address type, OS type, state, and volumes.

container_group_name.description: The name of the container group.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.
